channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Plugin Lister
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Plugin Lister

item.title: CVE-2023-6503|2024-08-02T08:35:14.587Z -- unknown -- wp%20plugin%20lister
item.description: The WP Plugin Lister WordPress plugin through 2.1.0 does not have CSRF check in some places, and is missing sanitisation as well as escaping, which could allow attackers to make logged in admin add Stored XSS payloads via a CSRF attack.
